Package handist.mpijunit

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Configuration
    Contains various String constants used to define the behavior of the MpiRunner.
    MpiApgasTestLauncher
    Launcher class for tests that rely on a combination of MPI and APGAS for Java calls.
    MpiRunner
    Custom Junit Runner which uses MPI to run the test class it receives.
    MpiTestLauncher
    Default launcher for the MpiRunner.
    Notification
    Class used to capture the fact the ToFileRunNotifier was called.
    ToFileRunNotifier
    Custom implementation of the Junit RunNotifier.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    MpiConfig
    Annotation used to set some environment settings for test classes that use the MpiRunner.
